TextView.android:text: • This App helps employees to update their daily work details instantaneously to the reporting manager. • Preparing daily reports allows team members to understand the activities and procedures that takes place within the day. • Actual and potential threats or limitations can also be identified and prevented • Organizations make use of daily reports in order to evaluate and plan for their performance on a short-term or long-term basis. • Daily reports also serve as the foundation to larger types of data reports and understand the approximate time for project accomplishments.
